abstract: The S.E.C. scored a win in one case against a hedge fund, Carlson Capital, but it was dealt a loss in another hedge-fund case involving Wynnefield Capital.
snippet: The S.E.C. scored a win in one case against a hedge fund, Carlson Capital, but it was dealt a loss in another hedge-fund case involving Wynnefield Capital.
lead_paragraph: Let’s take a look at one win and one loss for the Securities and Exchange Commission on the hedge-fund front this week.

headline.main: S.E.C. v. Hedge Funds: This Week It’s a Tie

byline.original: By Peter Lattman and Susanne Craig
